comment:
Even if she had lied in all these instances, it doesn't demonstrate "pathological" lying.  Pathological lying is when you lie repeatedly for no reason at all.... it's when you can't help but lie.  Ironically, JD has admitted in interviews that he lies during interviews when he doesn't feel like telling the truth... in other words, JOHNNY is the pathological liar.... he chooses to lie for no reason when he could just as easily say, "I'd rather not answer that."  But since 99% of people on YT watching this are going to be youths with no life experience and uneducated people.... of course the comments will be filled with people in agreement with JD.  The sad part is, that there is again no evidence provided here that she actually lied about anything... it wasn't even Amber that made the claim about the cops being homophobic... it was the ex gf who gave that statement.  The other instances, there's no proof... just Johnny's word against hers....  I mean why was her claim about the bed breaking a lie?  Was the bed not replaced or fixed?  (Maybe I missed it, but I don't think they actually explained why that was supposed to be a lie, but just assumed you would take JDs word?)


Sorry, but no, I still believe her and think JDs team is just playing dirty by not waiting to settle this like adults in court.  This is just making him look more and more pathetic and vindictive for the damage he did himself to his career.... fucking suck it up Johnny, apologize, get some therapy to deal with your anger management and drug addiction AND ALCOHOLISM (which he denies!!??!!??) and pay your debt to society like every other wife beater.  This is just another example of rich people thinking that with enough money they can buy their way out of anything... 


Oh here's a link to the article I referenced above (definitely an eye opener into the kind of weirdo JD has been  for decades):  http://interview.johnnydepp-zone2.com/1993_05Details.html
